name: Knight
description: You became a knight – a mounted warrior proficient in lance, shield, and sword.

exploits.name: Bonded mount
exploits.description: You gain a loyal warhorse. The warhorse is bonded to you, and gains +2 SPEED while you are riding it. If the warhorse dies, you can replace it after a week of mourning.

exploits.name: Jouster
exploits.description: You can charge an enemy from horseback using your lance. This attack gains +2d6 to both attack and damage, and requires you to move on horseback at least 20' in a straight line.

exploits.name: Jumper
exploits.description: Your horse's free JUMP distance increases by 5' horizontally, and 5' vertically.

exploits.name: Honorable
exploits.description: Your courage and honor are such that you are immune to the Afraid condition.

exploits.name: Squire
exploits.description: You gain a free squire. You must protect your squire; in exchange, one weapon or one suit of armor you possess increases by one quality level (to a maximum of artisan). If your squire dies, he is replaced in one month.
